name: Olivia
text: Here is my shy friend, Tristan.

name: Olivia
text: He is a bit of a scaredy-cat if you couldn't tell.

name: Olivia
text:
Use the W key and S keys to stretch 
up and down...

name: Olivia
text:
to avoid the long biters, they love the 
smell of fear.

name: Olivia
text:
Let me know when you are ready to move on 
to the next tutorial.
